title: ISic000982. Funerary inscription for Peithane
body:
1τόπος
2Πειθα-
3νῆς
4figure_zoomorphic ⳨ figure_zoomorphic

1ΤΟΠΟΣ
2ΠΕΙΘΑ
3ΝΗΣ
4figure_zoomorphic⳨figure_zoomorphic

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after published editions and apograph of Orsi

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Resting place of Peithane

commentary
